dmca.title: Bit Torrent Takedown Notice Notice ID: 27-9328
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: fox-no-reply@copyright-compliance.com
[mailto:fox-no-reply@copyright-compliance.com] 
Sent: Saturday, May 21, 2005 3:27 PM
To: legal-response@theplanet.com
Subject: Bit Torrent Takedown Notice Notice ID: 27-9328

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

To:  http://www.fulldls.com/

        Via E-Mail at madness.fulldls@gmail.com

        Re:  Star Wars Episode III:  Revenge of the Sith

Notice ID:27-9328
Notice  Date:21 May 2005 19:51:47 GMT


Dear http://www.fulldls.com/:

        We are writing to you on behalf of Twentieth Century Fox Film
Corporation ("Twentieth Century Fox") to address torrents available on
http://www.fulldls.com/ that correspond to infringing copies of the film
Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith.  Twentieth Century Fox is
authorized to enforce the relevant copyrights on behalf of the copyright
owner, Lucasfilm Ltd. ("Lucasfilm").  We advise you, under penalty of
perjury, that we are authorized to act on behalf of Twentieth Century Fox
with regard to the infringement of this work, that the information in this
letter is accurate, and that we have a good faith belief that the activity
described below is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or law.

        Torrents for Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith are
available, and readily accessible, on http://www.fulldls.com/.  A search for
search terms associated with Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith
yields the following listing(s), among others:
 

 
http://www.fulldls.com/torrents3/StarWarsEpisodioIIILaVenganzadelosSithVHSSc
reenerDivx5MP3wwwDivxTotalcomSpanish(www.fulldls.com).torrent
 
http://www.fulldls.com/torrents3/StarWarsEpisodioIIILaVenganzadelosSithSpani
shVHSScreeneravi(www.fulldls.com).torrent
 
http://www.fulldls.com/torrents3/StarWarsEpisodeIIIRevengeOfTheSith2005ReEnc
odedByTBoyavi(www.fulldls.com).torrent
 
http://www.fulldls.com/torrents2/Star.Wars.III.Revenge.of.the.Sith(www.fulld
ls.com).torrent
 
http://www.fulldls.com/torrents2/Star.Wars.Revenge.of.the.Sith.Episode.3(www
.fulldls.com).torrent

        The torrents listed above are only a few representative examples,
but not all, of the torrents that may be available on your site that permit
users to download Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith.  

        We demand that http://www.fulldls.com/ immediately cease and desist
making available torrent files for Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the
Sith.  http://www.fulldls.com/ must immediately remove all torrents that
permit users to download Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith from
its site, including but not limited to those identified above.  We also
remind you that, because http://www.fulldls.com/ is now on notice of
potential claims against it and its users, http://www.fulldls.com/,
including its owners, operators, agents, and employees, has the obligation
to preserve all evidence related to the uploading and downloading of Star
Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith, including all server logs and any
other related materials.

        We require that you provide a written response to this letter by
next business day, confirming that http://www.fulldls.com/ has removed all
torrents that permit users to download Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of
the Sith, including but not limited to those identified above, and is
preserving all evidence relevant to this unlawful conduct, including
evidence (log files, etc.) related to all persons who uploaded or downloaded
the offending torrent files.  

Twentieth Century Fox and Lucasfilm each reserves all of its respective
rights and remedies against http://www.fulldls.com/ and its owners,
operators, agents, and employees.  Nothing in this letter is a waiver of any
of Twentieth Century Fox's or Lucasfilm's rights or remedies with regard to
Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith or with regard to any other
work in which either of them holds any copyright, all of which are expressly
reserved.

Please contact us at the above listed address or by replying to this email
should you have any questions.

Very truly yours,

Sarah Bergman
Compliance Manager
BayTSP, Inc.
PO Box 1314
Los Gatos, CA 95031

v: 408-341-2300
f:  408-341-2399

*pgp public key is available on the key server at ldap://keyserver.pgp.com

Note:  The information transmitted in this Notice is intended only for the
person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential
and/or privileged material.  Any review, reproduction, retransmission,
dissemination or other use of, or taking of any action in reliance upon,
this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient is
prohibited.  If you received this in error, please contact the sender and
delete the material from all computers.


-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: 8.0

iD8DBQFCj5mUUONhpY5vJJIRAs7WAJ9g5sE9y1pWN4YYQt5M5UBkYG4uoQCfatsj
d9fR8wEkQY6R1KcNLKgtBvM=
=e2e5
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
